game.name: Crowd City War
game.description:
You would not like to take out a chance of missing this brand new adventure challenge especially while seeking for an awesome fun activity. It is pretty different from the other commonly played fun challenges. Run all across the city and grab all people who look similar to you in Crowd City War game! Show off your leadership skills to include as many similar looking people in your group as you can to crush your opponents! Common boys! You know the trick of making the biggest crowd in the town.

An amazing battle is awaiting you! Be fast as your opponents are very quick and try to make every possible effort to increase their groups in this HTML5 running game! Run like a champion and get ready to rush through all the streets of your city! The individuals who will be good in number will win the race finally. No! Kill as many enemies as you can and do not forget to keep running from one street to another to capture similar-looking people.

Track how many rivals you have killed as of now by looking at the top left corner of the screen! The right top right portion of the screen will also show yours and your opponents followers. Collect the followers of other players to remove their number from the screen in this action-packed challenge! Find and play many such other popular free online titles and have fun without download on atmegame.com! Lead a great number of people and show off the world who is the actual boss!
